doc_description: Attending Physician Statement for John Doe, 55yo male with L4-L5 disc herniation and subsequent microdiscectomy

tree.title: Face Sheet
tree.summary: Patient demographics and insurance information for John Doe

tree.title: History and Physical
tree.summary: Initial evaluation documenting work injury with lower back pain and left leg radiculopathy

tree.title: Progress Notes
tree.summary: Follow-up notes showing gradual improvement with physical therapy

tree.title: Laboratory Report
tree.summary: CBC and CMP results showing elevated glucose and HbA1c

tree.title: Imaging Report
tree.summary: MRI lumbar spine showing L4-L5 disc herniation with L5 nerve root compression

tree.title: Medication List
tree.summary: Current medications including pain management and chronic disease medications

tree.title: Physical Therapy Notes
tree.summary: PT session 8 showing improved ROM and decreased pain levels

tree.title: Operative Report
tree.summary: L4-L5 microdiscectomy performed with successful nerve root decompression

tree.title: Discharge Summary
tree.summary: Post-surgical discharge with improved symptoms and return-to-work plan
